SUCCESS_MESSAGES.TICKET_EMAIL_SENT: The requested ticket was sent to the e-mail address provided.

ERROR_MESSAGES.DEFAULT: an error has occurred, try again
ERROR_MESSAGES.FORBIDDEN: You don't have authorization to view this page
ERROR_MESSAGES.UNKNOWN_KIOSK_GROUP: Sorry, the laboratory you scanned does not exist. Please scan the QR code again.
ERROR_MESSAGES.INVALID_KIOSK_GROUP: Sorry, the scanned lab is invalid, please try again later.
ERROR_MESSAGES.KIOSK_GROUP_NOT_LINKED: Sorry, the scanned lab is not configured, please try again later.
ERROR_MESSAGES.FAR_KIOSK_GROUP: Sorry, the scanned lab is not in your approximate area, please approach your laboratory and try again.
ERROR_MESSAGES.LIST_NEAREST_KIOSK_GROUPS_ERROR: An error occurred during the retrieval of the laboratories.
ERROR_MESSAGES.SCAN_KIOSK_GROUP_ERROR: An error occurred during the retrieval of the laboratory.
ERROR_MESSAGES.SERVICE_LIST_SERVER_ERROR: An error occurred during the retrieval of the services.
ERROR_MESSAGES.QUEUE_NOT_FOUND_OR_NOT_IN_TIME_RANGE: Selected service not found or out of time
ERROR_MESSAGES.SCHEDULE_ACTIVITY_IN_WRONG_KIOSK_GROUP: Your appointment corresponds to another laboratory.
ERROR_MESSAGES.TICKET_EMAIL_NOT_SENT: Unable to send ticket e-mail, try again
ERROR_MESSAGES.TICKET_EMAIL_ERROR: An error occurred while sending the ticket email
ERROR_MESSAGES.SERVICE_NOT_FOUND: Service not found, please try again later
ERROR_MESSAGES.KIOSK_GROUP_NOT_FOUND: Laboratory not found, please try again later
ERROR_MESSAGES.CREATE_TICKET_ERROR: An error occurred during ticket creation.
ERROR_MESSAGES.UNKOWN_ERROR: an error occurred, please try again later. if the error persists, contact the administrator
ERROR_MESSAGES.msg1:
You are too far from the laboratory. Please stay nearby until your scheduled appointment time. 

 Your ticket will be automatically deleted if you are not near the laboratory 15 minutes before the scheduled time
